get.summary: Retrieve partner details by login email

400.description: Bad request, missing company_profile_id or partner with the same UEI exists

parameters.name: partner_genie_user_id

get.description: Searches for partners based on the provided search query and optional parameters.

parameters.name: searchQuery
parameters.description: The search query to filter partners

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The number of results to return (default:10)

condition.description: if condition is verify_email it just verify the email exists already

is_active.description: represents the alive status of user

request_message.description: request message send by the requester
